channel.title: [Serious Question]Why is there a MoparScape
channel.description: Ya, Like.. I played Runescape 4 years back, I understand its a Private Server Community. But like, it failed.. Is it because of the ad cash that comes with it? or Idk, I've logged into it before but didn't stay for long. And I'm not trying to advertise but Ikiliki cares more about it than you. Hes got a big forum. And I hate Iki so I'm not cheering for him. But ya... Why is Mscp Here... The purpose.. Its gotten completely out of control with spam. Like at least a 3rd of it is spam. Anyways, Sorry if this doesn't fit your needs as a question but I seriously want to know..

item.title: [Serious Question]Why is there a MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

No, they would like that.

Read full topic

item.title: [Serious Question]Why is there a MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

There are enough retards on MITB, and to make it fair you have to make it harder for MITB’ers to get to moparscape. Of course you still have the risk that new members come here first, and ask their retarded questions here. But thats why there is a ban hammer. Don’t be nice, it’s time for actions.

Read full topic

item.title: [Serious Question]Why is there a MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Don’t make it harder for a MITB member to be on Moparscape, then we only risk more stupid questions here.

The quiz was to easy.
Make something no one/few knows and have to search on.
Like who is the president of Iceland.
¨
If I am not wrong, the quiz is about search for the question self.

Read full topic

item.title: [Serious Question]Why is there a MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Make everyone redo the quiz again, add harder questions, and make all moparscapers do the quiz again to get to MITB, and all MITB’ers do the quiz again to get to moparscape. So yes, if a member of MITB wants to go to moparscape again, he has to do the quiz twice. Why? To add an extra hurdle between the two.

Read full topic

no dont make the quiz harder i had to google that shit to find out 2 of the answers i think back in the day, like 06-07 hah

item.title: [Serious Question]Why is there a MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:7, topic:244799”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=321210.msg2541492#msg2541492 date=1227032555]
If there was not a moparisthebest.com, all of those members would be over here posting. In fact that is why it was split off this domain in the first place. There is much more spam than anyone likes, but there are many people moderating it and doing the best job possible.

If anyone has ideas on how to improve the site, please let me know. Simply getting rid of it is not the answer.
[/quote]
Make the quiz harder.[/quote]

Along with that, make every current member retake the new and improved test, to filter out the mentally retarded.

Read full topic

item.title: [Serious Question]Why is there a MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

io9:

Well, we have Autorune Crew, but there are like, two semi-active people with it.

I’m not referring to Autorune, I was talking about the mscp vet system for RSC sections. It was suggested on irc a few days back.

item.title: [Serious Question]Why is there a MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

There should be more rewards, it fuels competition and it might be the thing needed to pull moparscape out of the mud.

casey.:

Then that would become a hassle because everyone would want it. Something like a RSC Vet would be nice though.[/quote]

Well, we have Autorune Crew, but there are like, two semi-active people with it.
